channel.title: Admin capes
channel.description:
Hey well i added this admin cape to my server http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342445.0.html and well when i put it in and added model and all that and when i equip it, seems that it goes to the weapon slot... can someone please tell me a tut on how to change i would really appreciate it thank you...
if(i == 13965) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Equip"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 11112; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 11112; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 11112; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 400; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Admin Cape"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "The admin cape that can only be worn by amazing people.".getBytes(); // Item Examine }
THAT WAS THE INT FOR THE CAPE

item.title: Admin capes
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Or, get the ID of a similar item, and then search for it in item.java and item4.java and place your new cape in the exact same spots.

Read full topic

item.title: Admin capes
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

This should go in client help, but to fix this open your item.java and item4.java. Find ‘capes’ in both files and enter the item ID. Then save, and compile your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Admin capes
item.dc:creator: @TheLegitScape TheLegitScape
item.description:
@TheLegitScape wrote:

Hey well i added this admin cape to my server http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342445.0.html and well when i put it in and added model and all that and when i equip it, seems that it goes to the weapon slot… can someone please tell me a tut on how to change i would really appreciate it thank you…

THAT WAS THE INT FOR THE CAPE
